about.summary: Tools to load 'R' packages and automatically generate BibTeX files citing them as well as load and cache plain-text and 'Excel' formatted data stored on 'GitHub', and from other sources.

name: r-repmis
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.5' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-repmis
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/repmis_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/repmis/repmis_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 65a5d32349baceb68e8761f3d585cb8450c5f22b2373a5005dd21341f592b57c

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-r.cache
    - r-data.table
    - r-digest
    - r-httr
    - r-plyr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-r.cache
    - r-data.table
    - r-digest
    - r-httr
    - r-plyr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('repmis')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('repmis')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://cran.r-project.org/package=repmis
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Tools to load 'R' packages and automatically generate BibTeX files citing them as
    well as load and cache plain-text and 'Excel' formatted data stored on 'GitHub',
    and from other sources.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: repmis
# Type: Package
# Title: Miscellaneous Tools for Reproducible Research
# Description: Tools to load 'R' packages and automatically generate BibTeX files citing them as well as load and cache plain-text and 'Excel' formatted data stored on 'GitHub', and from other sources.
# Version: 0.5
# Date: 2016-02-06
# Authors@R: c( person("Christopher", "Gandrud", email = "christopher.gandrud@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre")) )
# License: GPL (>= 3)
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.0)
# URL: http://cran.r-project.org/package=repmis
# BugReports: https://github.com/christophergandrud/repmis/issues
# Imports: data.table, digest, httr, plyr, R.cache
# Suggests: xlsx
# RoxygenNote: 5.0.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2016-02-06 19:46:42 UTC; christophergandrud
# Author: Christopher Gandrud [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Christopher Gandrud <christopher.gandrud@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2016-02-07 09:16:30
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.1
